1.name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
1.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

2.name: Persona
2.description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

3.name: Blow-Up
3.description: A mod London photographer finds something very suspicious in the shots he has taken of a mysterious beauty in a desolate park.

4.name: Batman: The Movie
4.description: The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

5.name: Fahrenheit 451
5.description: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.

6.name: Andrei Rublev
6.description: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer.

7.name: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
7.description: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use a young couple to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other.

8.name: Grand Prix
8.description: American Grand Prix driver Pete Aron is fired by his Jordan-BRM racing team after a crash at Monaco that injures his British teammate, Scott Stoddard.

9.name: The Sand Pebbles
9.description: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

10.name: A Man for All Seasons
10.description: The story of Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.

11.name: Daisies
11.description: Two girls try to understand the meaning of the world and their life.

12.name: Modesty Blaise
12.description: A spy spoof in the 60s tradition featuring the comic book heroine Modesty Blaise set in the Italian Mediterranean.

13.name: Manos: The Hands of Fate
13.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

14.name: Khartoum
14.description: In the Sudan, in 1884 to 1885, Egyptian forces led by a British General defend Khartoum against an invading Muslim Army led by a religious fanatic, the Mahdi.

15.name: The Battle of Algiers
15.description: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

16.name: The Quiller Memorandum
16.description: In the West Berlin of the 1960s, two British agents are killed by a Nazi group, prompting British Intelligence to dispatch agent Quiller to investigate.

17.name: Django
17.description: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a half-breed prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

18.name: Fantastic Voyage
18.description: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his blood stream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter the bloodstream.

19.name: The Chase
19.description: The escape of Bubber Reeves from prison affects the inhabitants of a small Southern town.

20.name: The Shooting
20.description: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.

21.name: War and Peace
21.description: Eight-hour epic based on the book of the same name by Leo Tolstoy. Two main story-lines are complex and intertwined. One is the love story of young Countess Natasha Rostova and Count Pierre...                See full summary »

22.name: Ride in the Whirlwind
22.description: Three cowboys, mistaken for members of an outlaw gang, are relentlessly pursued by a posse.

23.name: The Professionals
23.description: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.

24.name: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum
24.description: A wily slave must unite a virgin courtesan and his young smitten master to earn his freedom.

25.name: Au Hasard Balthazar
25.description: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

26.name: The Bible: In the Beginning...
26.description: Extravagant production of the first part of the book of Genesis. Covers Adam and Eve, Noah and the Flood and Abraham and Isaac.

27.name: Seconds
27.description: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.

28.name: Torn Curtain
28.description: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin before planning an escape back to the West.

29.name: Return of the Magnificent Seven
29.description: Two survivors of the initial Magnificent Seven outfit, Chris and Vin, recruit four new members in order to re-form the outfit and defend a few Mexican villages from attacks by vicious bandits.

30.name: Alfie
30.description: An unrepentant ladies' man gradually begins to understand the consequences of his lifestyle.

31.name: The Russians Are Coming the Russians Are Coming
31.description: Without hostile intent, a Soviet submarine runs aground off New England. Men are sent for a boat, but many villagers go into a tizzy, risking bloodshed.

32.name: The Black Klansman
32.description: After a black man's daughter is killed by the KKK, he seeks revenge by becoming a Klansman.

33.name: How to Steal a Million
33.description: Romantic comedy about a woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries, and the man who helps her.

34.name: One Million Years B.C.
34.description: Prehistoric man Tumak is banished from his savage tribe and meets pretty Loana who belongs to a gentler coastal tribe but he must fight caveman Payto to win her favors.

35.name: Cast a Giant Shadow
35.description: In 1947, following the U.N. decision to split British Palestine into separate Jewish and Palestinian states, a former U.S. Army officer is recruited by the Jews to reorganize the Haganah.

36.name: The Silencers
36.description: Retired agent Matt Helm is re-activated in order to stop an evil organization from exploding an atom bomb over the USA and starting WWIII.

37.name: A Man and a Woman
37.description: A widow and a widower find their relationship developing into love, but their past tragedies prove hard to overcome, causing them to proceed with utmost delicacy.

38.name: The Fortune Cookie
38.description: A crooked lawyer persuades his brother-in-law to feign a serious injury.

39.name: Madame X
39.description: When her lover is killed, the wife of a wealthy man is convinced to fake her own death, which leads her into greater depths of depravity until fate reunites her with her long-lost son, who is unaware of her real identity.

40.name: The Trouble with Angels
40.description: Two high-spirited young students at St. Francis Academy For Girls keep things hopping for the challenged Mother Superior and her staff of bewildered Sisters.

41.name: Nevada Smith
41.description: A half American Indian and half white teenager evolves into a hardened killer as he tracks down his parents' murderers.

42.name: Hawaii
42.description: An American missionary and his wife travel to the exotic island kingdom of Hawaii, intent on converting the natives. But the clash between the two cultures is too great and instead of understanding there comes tragedy.

43.name: Arabesque
43.description: Story of international intrigue involving a university professor, an Arab prime minister, a ruthless businessman, a beautiful spy, and hieroglyphics.

44.name: Dead Heat on a Merry-Go-Round
44.description: A paroled conman co-ordinates the robbery of an L. A. Airport bank with the arrival of the Soviet premier.

45.name: Masculin Féminin
45.description: A romance between young Parisians, shown through a series of vignettes.

46.name: Georgy Girl
46.description: A homely but vivacious young woman dodges the amorous attentions of her father's middle-aged employer while striving to capture some of the glamorous life of her swinging London roommate.

47.name: Carry On Screaming!
47.description: The sinister Dr Watt has an evil scheme going. He's kidnapping beautiful young women and turning them into mannequins to sell to local stores. Fortunately for Dr Watt, Detective-Sergeant ...                See full summary »

48.name: This Property Is Condemned
48.description: The dramatic love story of small-town Mississippi girl Alva Starr and railroad official Owen Legate, set during the Great Depression.

49.name: Closely Watched Trains
49.description: An apprentice train dispatcher at a village station seeks his first sexual encounter and becomes despondent when he is unable to perform.

50.name: The Wild Angels
50.description: The "Angels", a San Pedro motorcycle gang, parties in the Coachella Valley's Palm Springs Indian Canyons, California, and wreaks havoc with the local police.
